mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store ( store_name, category, section_id, address1, address2, zipcode, coordinates, tel_main, tel_sub, img1, img2, store_url, tag_keyword, tag_menu, tag_service, open, nickname, reg_date, chg_date ) VALUES ( #{storeName}, #{category}, #{sectionId}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{zipcode}, #{coordinates}, #{telMain}, #{telSub}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{storeUrl}, #{tagKeyword}, #{tagMenu}, #{tagService}, #{open}, #{nickname}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET category = #{category}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, coordinates = #{coordinates}, tel_main = #{telMain}, tel_sub = #{telSub}, img1 = #{img1}, img2 = #{img2}, store_url = #{storeUrl}, tag_keyword = #{tagKeyword}, tag_menu = #{tagMenu}, tag_service = #{tagService}, open = #{open}, nickname = #{nickname}, chg_date = now() WHERE store_name=#{storeName} AND section_id=#{sectionId}
mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, store_name AS storeName, category AS category, section_id AS sectionId, address1 AS address1, address2 AS address2, zipcode AS zipcode, coordinates AS coordinates, tel_main AS telMain, tel_sub AS telSub, img1 AS img1, img2 AS img2, store_url AS storeUrl, tag_keyword AS tagKeyword, tag_menu AS tagMenu, tag_service AS tagService, open AS open, nickname AS nickname, reg_date AS regDate, chg_date AS chgDate FROM store
